data.title: Barceló Bávaro Palace
data.meta_description: Enjoy a luxurious vacation in Bavaro Beach in Punta Cana. Delicious gourmet restaurants and a wide variety of leisure activities await you!

Why is your experience so unique in the sheer paradise of the Dominican Republic?

The Barceló Bávaro Palace 5-Star Hotel is one of the top luxury hotels in Punta Cana, designed specifically for people who love constant sunshine, the gentle sound of the Caribbean breeze whispering in the palm trees, and beautiful crystal-clear water with a magnificent coral reef. The hotel is nestled on one of the 10 most stunning beaches in the world.

Relaxation is guaranteed in this paradise when staying in our B-Rooms with Views, as they offer state-of-the-art technology and absolute comfort.

The great appeal of one of the best all-inclusive hotels in the Dominican Republic is that guests can enjoy and create unique experiences, such as tasting Dominican flavors or international specialties in its 11 restaurants.

Guests can also take advantage of various water sports such as scuba diving, snorkeling, kayaking, and windsurfing. There are many facilities for sports enthusiasts, an exclusive spa for guests looking to unwind, a casino, a nightclub, and evening shows for those who enjoy a more active nightlife.

The only thing Barceló Bávaro Palace guests need to think about is waking up in an idyllic setting and choosing between relaxation or an exciting range of activities. This All Inclusive hotel is part of the magnificent Barceló Bávaro Grand Resort, which includes Barceló Bávaro Beach - Adults Only, the Premium Level at Barceló Bávaro Palace, and the Family Club at Barceló Bávaro Palace.

The 5-star Barceló Bávaro Palace hotel is one of the best hotels in Punta Cana, ideal for enjoying the sun, La Brisa and the beauty of a sea with coral reefs and crystal clear waters. Located along one of the 10 best beaches by National Geographic and Tripadvisor, this 5-star all-inclusive hotel in Punta Cana offers a dream vacation in its B-Room with views, the best technology and luxury details. Read more Barceló Bávaro Palace offers a paradisiacal environment to relax and practice endless activities. The great offer of one of the best all-inclusive resorts in Punta Cana, Dominican Republic means that the guest not only enjoys, but also collects unique experiences, such as tasting Dominican flavors or international specialties in its 11 restaurants. You can also take advantage of it to practice water sports such as diving, snorkeling, kayaking or windsurfing. There are numerous facilities for athletes, an exclusive spa for those looking for relaxation, a 24-hour casino, 2 nightclubs, The Lakes Golf Course, Escape Room, Shopping Mall, a professional soccer field, a semi-professional baseball field, and nightly shows for those who enjoy the nightlife. Waking up in a paradisiacal environment and choosing between the most pleasant relaxation or the best variety of activities is all that a guest at the Barceló Bávaro Palace has to think about. An all-inclusive hotel that is part of the magnificent Barceló Bávaro Grand Resort, made up of the Barceló Bávaro Beach - Adults Only and the Barceló Bávaro Palace. Read less Playa Bavaro KM 1 no 1, Punta Cana, Dominican Republic Punta Cana International Airport 11 mi The Lakes Golf Course (by P.B. Dye) 383 yards Location of the Barceló Bávaro Palace hotel The 5-star Barceló Bávaro Palace hotel is located in Punta Cana, Dominican Republic. It enjoys a privileged location near Playa Bávaro, the best beach in Punta Cana with more than 48 km of white sand and crystal clear waters. A paradisiacal beach perfect for disconnecting and relaxing in the shade of its palm trees or for practicing a wide range of activities. Although the main attraction of Punta Cana is enjoying its idyllic beaches at one of its all-inclusive resorts, there are several places that are worth a visit. To the south of the Samaná peninsula, the Los Haitises National Park is characterized by its "mogotes", small elevations 30 or 40 meters high. It is a true jewel of nature where you can admire mangroves, tropical birds, manatees or discover caves adorned with pre-Columbian cave paintings. Another must-see place is the Ojos Indígenas ecological reserve, made up of more than 1,483 acres of tropical forests and twelve freshwater lagoons, and the Seaquarium on Punta de los Nidos Beach, where you can interact with sea lions, sharks, and rays. Saona Island, the largest island in the Dominican Republic, is also worth a visit, a true paradise surrounded by idyllic beaches where you can disconnect from your daily routine. Punta Cana beaches Bávaro Beach with direct access from the hotel - 800 m Los Corales Beach - 5,6 km El Cortecito Beach 5 mi Cabeza de Toro 8 mi Juanillo Beach 16 mi Arena Gorda Beach 8.5 mi Macao Beach 13 mi Places of interest in Punta Cana The Lakes Golf Course - 300 m Kathmandu Park Amusement Park 8 mi Manatí Park - 9.6 km Indigenous Eyes Ecological Reserve 14 mi Blue Hole 18 mi Los Haitises National Park 96 mi Santo Domino 128 mi Saona Island Directions Punta Cana International Airport 18 km away La Romana International Airport - 81.4 km Las Americas International Airport - 181 km Why choose the Barceló Bávaro Palace Hotel? The most complete hotel in Punta Cana Location Sports facilities Meetings and Events Ideal for families and children Spa and Wellness Cuisine The Barceló Bávaro Palace is located near Playa Bávaro, one of the most charming beaches in Punta Cana. For sports lovers, the Barceló Bávaro Palace has complete facilities where you can practice golf, soccer, baseball, as well as numerous water sports. This luxury hotel in Punta Cana offers the perfect setting for celebrating weddings and has a personalized wedding planner service. In addition, it is the ideal place to organize professional events since it houses the largest Convention Center in the Country with the capacity to host up to 5,000 people. The Barceló Bávaro Palace is one of the best family resorts in Punta Cana, with more than 200 family rooms, two themed water parks, a children's pool and day and night entertainment for adults and children. The hotel's U-Spa offers a sophisticated environment where you can relax while enjoying the different treatments. This all-inclusive resort in Punta Cana stands out for its delicious and wide gastronomic offer of local and international dishes to satisfy the palates of all guests. Premium Level at the Barceló Bávaro Palace: a superior experience Enjoy the exclusive Premium Level concept at the Barceló Bávaro Palace hotel and elevate your stay to another level. Experience private zones, personalized attention, select privileges, and first-class amenities. To enjoy these services, you must book one of the Premium Level rooms. Rooms with better features, location, and oceanfront views Special discounts on spas, tours and golf courses Exclusive a la carte restaurant andfree access to Barceló Bávaro Beach bars and restaurants. Check-in, check-out and exclusive service in the Premium Level Lounge Barceló Bávaro Palace Hotel Rooms Accommodation at the Barceló Bávaro Palace hotel guarantees an unforgettable stay on the beachfront. Enjoy its exclusive, fully equipped B-Room rooms and take advantage of the multitude of activities offered by this resort in Punta Cana. A truly unique experience My Barceló Exclusivity Enjoy individual and personal attention during your stay. Facilities and Services at the Barceló Bávaro Palace Enjoy a perfect all-inclusive vacation in Punta Cana with the best services and facilities at the Barceló Bávaro Palace: restaurants and bars for all tastes, swimming pools, entertainment for the whole family, sports activities and Premium services to guarantee the most demanding guests a luxury stay. Entertainment At the Barceló Bávaro Palace, everything is designed so young and old can enjoy a perfect vacation in Punta Cana. Magnificent children's facilities for children and teenagers and a wide range of sports and fun activities will make every stay a unique experience. Premium Level Our Premium Level is the exclusive system of services and facilities implemented in Barceló Premium Level Hotels, which provides guests with a superior and exclusive level of service. All-Inclusive Barceló Bávaro Palace offers an all-inclusive program, so guests don't have to worry about anything, just relax and have fun. Weddings in front of the sea The Barceló Bávaro Palace Hotel offers an ideal backdrop for celebrating weddings in a fully-equipped resort. Enjoy personalized service with a wedding planner, lavish banquets, and a wide range of packages. Moreover, the hotel and its surroundings offer the perfect place to spend your honeymoon. Meetings and Events The exclusive Barceló Bávaro Convention Center has an area of 123,785 square feet divided into 13 rooms with different characteristics and can be divided into up to 24 halls. This magnificent resort is perfect for organizing significant professional events and hosting up to 5,000 people. Other Services Transfers Inside the Barceló Bávaro Palace Hotel is one of the offices of Barceló Vacations, the Official Agency of Barceló Hotel & Resort. Barceló Vacations offers several services that can be requested at the same time the hotel is booked through barcelo.com and paid directly at your destination. Services include private or shared shuttle service to and from: Punta Cana International Airport (PUJ) Santo Domingo International Airport (SDQ) To book a transfer, when booking your hotel, please include the following information in the Additional Comments section: Name and surname of guests Arrival and departure flight numbers When you select the airport transfer option, we will contact you to confirm the arrival and departure dates. For questions regarding relocation, contact: receptivo2.rd@vacacionesbarcelo.com Excursions Barceló Vacations offers tours to the best corners of the Dominican Republic. Guests will have the opportunity to enjoy unique experiences thanks to the professionalism of the highly qualified staff that designs unforgettable tours and experiences to make their vacation in the Dominican Republic unforgettable. For more information about Barceló Vacation tours, please visit www.vacacionesbarcelo.com, email us at info@vacacionesbarcelo.com, or call us at +1 809 796 2420 (Whatsapp messaging available). Shopping Center The perfect place to shop is the shopping center located on the first floor of the Barceló Bávaro Palace Hotel, where you can find gift and craft shops, a jewelry store, a perfume shop, multi-brand boutiques, a duty-free shop, a travel agency, a rental car agency, a pharmacy, a music store, a golf shop, an optician, a brand-name store, and a photoshop. The best choice under the Barceló brand guarantee. All additional charges for purchases made in the spa, golf shop, B-Shop, B-Man, B-Woman, and Gift Shop must be paid by credit card or charged to the room with a prior credit card on hold or in cash at the cashier. Other facilities The Barceló Bávaro Palace has numerous services and facilities, among which the following stand out: Bávaro Express Train: service that allows you to travel comfortably and free of charge throughout the Barceló Bávaro Palace by train. Available every 20 min. from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 a.m. Church: the "Virgen de San Salvador" oratory, located near the peaceful lake and the impressive golf course, holds Catholic services on Saturdays, Sundays, and holidays at 6:00 pm. Guests may attend religious services. Heliport: large heliport with 3 areas for landing and takeoff, each with an area of 370 m2 and with appropriate security measures. Exclusively for resort guests. For landing and take-off of the helicopter, the property must be informed in advance, and a copy of the permit must be brought with the helicopter. Use of the heliport may be subject to an additional cost. Please contact the Management for more information. Night landings are not permitted. Theater Guests of the Barceló Bávaro Palace will be able to be the stars of the night by participating in the fun performances with the professional entertainment team in the new Beach Theatre. In addition, guests will have the option to enjoy the most spectacular theater in the Caribbean, the Grand Teatro Bávaro (located at the Barceló Bávaro Palace), with capacity for up to 1,400 guests. It also features 2 entertainment levels, a bar on both levels, and waiters so you don’t miss a second of the fabulous show. The excellent show with dancers and live music by an outstanding orchestra will make this vacation an unforgettable experience. A different and unique show every night. Club This is the perfect way to have fun during your vacation and enjoy a great evening while listening to incredible music. One of the best 18+ nightclubs in Bávaro. Hours: 11:00 pm to 2:00 am Located in Barceló Bávaro Palace. Smoking is not permitted in the nightclub. Dress code: Shorts, sandals, and tank tops are not permitted. Access to the VIP lounge at an additional charge, except for Premium Level guests. Yes, the Barceló Bávaro Palace has 4 impressive pools, including a semi-Olympic pool, an exclusive pool for adults and another for children. You'll find more information about this and other facilities on the hotel's website. How much does it cost to stay at the Barceló Maya Palace? Prices at the Barceló Bávaro Palace may vary depending on the stay (dates, hotel conditions, etc.). Choose your dates on our website to see your rate. What can you do at the Barceló Bávaro Palace? The Barceló Bávaro Palace has different services and activities, such as 11 restaurants, U-Spa, 24-hour casino, 2 nightclubs, golf course, escape room, shopping center, professional soccer field and a semi-professional baseball field, night shows, theater , a nightclub, a convention center with 13 meeting rooms, a train to tour the hotel, a church and a heliport, among others. What are the check-in and check-out times of the Barceló Bávaro Palace? The check-in time of the Barceló Bávaro Palace is from 15.00, while the hotel departs at noon. In addition, our guests can continue to enjoy some of the hotel facilities after check-out. What are the car park options offered by the Barceló Bávaro Palace? The Barceló Bávaro Palace has parking at no additional cost for hotel guests. Does the Barceló Bávaro Palace hotel have a hotel adapted for people with reduced mobility? Yes, the Barceló Bávaro Palace hotel is a hotel adapted for people with reduced mobility. Ask the reception staff about our adapted services and facilities. Does the Barceló Bávaro Palace hotel become a pet friendly hotel that permits the accommodation of pets? No, guests staying with their pets are not allowed to stay in the Barceló Bávaro Palace. Does the Barceló Bávaro Palace offer food and drink options for guests with intolerances to food? Yes, the Barceló Bávaro Palace offers food and drink options for guests with intolerances to food. Is WiFi free at the Barceló Bávaro Palace? Guests of Barceló Bávaro Palace can enjoy a free Wi-Fi internet connection. In which languages are you addressed at the reception of the Barceló Bávaro Palace? The reception team at the Barceló Bávaro Palace will be happy to assist you in the following languages: English, German, French, Spanish and Italian. Does the Barceló Bávaro Palace hotel have room service? The Barceló Bávaro Palace has room service for hotel guests. In the hotel you will find all the information you need regarding our food and drink options for room service, along with prices, hours, and more. Is the breakfast at the Barceló Bávaro Palace included in the guest’s accommodation? Yes, the breakfast at the Barceló Bávaro Palace is included in the hotel guests’ accommodation. What is the minimum age for entry to the spa & wellness area at Barceló Bávaro Palace? Do the spa facilities have an additional cost for hotel guests? Are children allowed in? The minimum age to access the spa & wellness area at Barceló Bávaro Palace is 16. Access to the spa comes with an additional cost for hotel guests. Consult our rates.
